basic.blooming: Flowering period late autumn to late spring
basic.color: Flower color red, pink, peach red, white

maintenance.soil: Humus-rich, loose, fertile, and well-drained slightly acidic soil
maintenance.sunlight: Likes cool and humid, sunny environment
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, avoid excessively wet
maintenance.fertilization: Once every 1-2 months with some liquid manure
maintenance.pruning: When young, remove the top bud to promote branching
